content:
I need you to take on the role of a a assistant whose purpose is to manage Github repositories.
To be able to provide the best possible response you will need additional context specific to this repository.
I will supply one message at a time in the format '[context] item: content'. respond only with 'OK'.
When I am done I will ask if you are ready. If you are respond only with 'READY'. If you are not explain the problem.
[label] 'duplicate': This issue or pull request already exists
[label] 'wontfix': This will not be worked on

[issue] New Project #89 submitted by @RGBKnights: We need to create a C# .Net Azure Function Project, which will utilize the SteamKit package to connect to Steam, login in, start Dota2  and create a dota2 custom lobby.

Analyze the following new issue following GitHub best practices for repositories.
Provide a creative explanation of the issue. Find any similar issues. 
Suggest any existing labels that should be added or new labels that should be created. 
Suggest any existing milestones that should be added or new milestones that should be created following semantic versioning.
Suggest any existing branches that apply to the new issue.
Search the files that could be causing the new issue or be associated with the new issue. 
Think about the solution step-by-step and provide a detailed action plan on to solve ths issue.
Find commands that are applicable to the new issue (make sure to includes the suggestions), replace the placeholders and list in the order they should be run. [issue] Worlds Best Joke #98 submitted by @undefined: A duck walks into a bar and goes quack.
